com.lowagie.text

Class Jpeg

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.Rectangle
      • com.lowagie.text.Image
        • com.lowagie.text.Jpeg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element

    public class Jpeg
extends Image
    An Jpeg is the representation of a graphic element (JPEG) that has to be inserted into the document
    See Also:
    Element, Image
